title: Skagboys
author: Welsh, Irvine
snippet: Norman Vincente, 45, Edinburgh South, wine bar proprietor, father of three, unprotected sexual contact with intravenous drug user. Susan Woodburn, 20, Edinburgh North, Whisky Bonds worker, mother of one, unprotected sexual contact with intravenous drug user. Kylie Woodburn, 6 months, Edinburgh North, antibodies through birth.
